author: daynakovacic
title: Cardano Film Studios
description: There is a lack of global awareness about Distributed Ledger Technology/Blockchains. It is perceived as only for trading or crime.
solution: Raise awareness of real life use cases for Cardano through feature films and create Cardano film production templates for the industry
